participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and enthusiastic about new opportunities.
participant_1.background: I like mangoes because they are sweet and juicy. I got a new job. I am not an avid exerciser, but I do enjoy walking on the beach with my family. I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up. My wife recently got laid off from her human resources job.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid back, with a passion for music.
participant_2.background: I'm sad that my laptop's battery is faulty. I play guitar in my free time. I'm a drummer in an indie band. I work at a coffee shop. I'm a night owl, but my cat wakes me up every morning.

content.text: I'm so excited for the new job, I've been waiting for this for so long.
Congrats on the new job! What will you be doing?
I'm going to be a wedding planner, I've always loved weddings and I can't wait to help people plan their special day.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it. My wife got laid off recently and she's looking for a new job, do you know of any openings?
I'm sorry to hear that, I hope she finds something soon. I'll keep an eye out for any openings and let you know if I find anything.
What do you do for work?
I work at a coffee shop, it's a pretty laid back job but it's fun. I also play guitar in an indie band on the side.
Oh that's cool, I used to play guitar too. What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of indie rock and alternative rock.
That sounds fun, I'd love to hear you play sometime.
Sure, I'd love to play for you sometime.
Great, let's exchange numbers and we can set something up.
Sounds good, I'll send you a text
